alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 3:40PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Volusia County through 415 PM EDT... At 340 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ormond-By-the-Sea, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ormond-By-the-Sea and Ormond Beach Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
